name: PhaseShift (Tilman Schmidt)
description:
An arcady bullet hell game about being in the right phase.

How to play:

  1. Absorb bullets in the same phase/colour as you
  2. Avoid bullets in a differen phase/colour than you
  3. Switch phase/colour by passing through the portals spawning in the level
  4. Survive, get a high score!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • That's it!
